subject: Tennis
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Known for his two-handed swing, Fabrice Santoro played 20 of the 24 players who have been No. 1 in the ATP rankings and finished in the top 65 in 17 seasons.
snippet: Known for his two-handed swing, Fabrice Santoro played 20 of the 24 players who have been No. 1 in the ATP rankings and finished in the top 65 in 17 seasons.
